subject: Creativity
title: Virtual Concerts: When the Stage Has No Walls
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Virtual Concerts: When the Stage Has No Walls.

hook.text: In 2020, Travis Scott performed inside Fortnite. 12.3 million people attended simultaneously. No venue can do that.

buildup.text: Virtual concerts let artists defy physics â€” flying through space, transforming into giants, reshaping the world live.

discovery.text: These aren't just concerts streamed online. They're entirely new creative experiences impossible in physical space.

twist.text: ABBA's 'Voyage' show uses digital avatars of the band at age 30, performing live in London nightly.

climax.text: The line between concert, game, and film is dissolving. Music becomes an immersive world, not just sound.

punchline.text: The future stage exists everywhere and nowhere.

quiz.question: How many people attended Travis Scott's Fortnite concert simultaneously?
